code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BotCard=props=>{const{bot}=props;let botType;switch(bot.bot_class){case"Assault":botType=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon military"});break;case"Defender":botType=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon shield"});break;case"Support":botType=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon ambulance"});break;default:botType=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ui column",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ui card",onClick:()=>props.addBot(bot),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"oh no!",src:bot.avatar_url})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[bot.name," ",botType]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"meta text-wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:bot.catchphrase})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"extra content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon heartbeat"}),bot.health]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon lightning"}),bot.damage]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon shield"}),bot.armor]})]})]},bot.id)});};export default BotCard;
